page.title: 20And Finally
page.content:
Our survey shows that the village is small and struggling to retain its own separate institutions.Although people come and go it still manages to preserve its own identity with its own Church and School but because of its size constant vigilance is necessary to ensure that these two, as well as the Post Office,Bus Service (however infreqent),and Telephone Kiosks are kept here in the face of the current twin Gods of efficiency and economy.
Credit is due to Matthew and Rachel Yates,Caroline and Shirley Carter, Elizabeth and Marianne Tomlinson, Gillian Capstick,Matthew Lowther, Mark Connick,Joanne Collinson and James Pratt,the entire Junior pupils fo the school,who helped Mr.J.Harrison the Headteacher in this survey.
